summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1687, for the improvement of the alleys in blocks "E" and "F" of an addition to the town (now city) of Seattle, as laid off by A. A. Denny, being the alleys between Western Avenue and First Avenue; and from University Street to the south line of Seneca Street; by grading and paving the same, together with such retaining walls, sewers, catch basins and other appurtenances as may be necessary, under Ordinance No. 17763 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
